Home > MLVcode > edges-master > toolbox-master > external > deprecated > clfEcoc.m

clfEcoc

PURPOSE

Wrapper for ecoc that makes ecoc compatible with nfoldxval.

SYNOPSIS

function clf = clfEcoc(p,clfInit,clfparams,nclasses,use01targets)

DESCRIPTION 

 Wrapper for ecoc that makes ecoc compatible with nfoldxval.

 Requires the SVM toolbox by Anton Schwaighofer.

 USAGE
  clf = clfEcoc(p,clfInit,clfparams,nclasses,use01targets)

 INPUTS
  p               - data dimension
  clfInit         - binary classifier init (see nfoldxval)
  clfparams       - binary classifier parameters (see nfoldxval)
  nclasses        - num of classes (currently 3<=nclasses<=7 suppored)
  use01targets    - see ecoc

 OUTPUTS
  clf             - see ecoc

 EXAMPLE

 See also ECOC, NFOLDXVAL, CLFECOCCODE

 Piotr's Image&Video Toolbox      Version 2.0
 Copyright 2008 Piotr Dollar.  [pdollar-at-caltech.edu]
 Please email me if you find bugs, or have suggestions or questions!
 Licensed under the Lesser GPL [see external/lgpl.txt]

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • clfEcocCode Generates optimal ECOC codes when 3<=nclasses<=7.
This function is called by:
  • demoClassify DEMOCLASSIFY A demo used to test and demonstrate the usage of classifiers (clf*)

SUBFUNCTIONS

  • function clf = clfEcocTrain( clf, varargin )

0027 
0028 if( nclasses<3 || nclasses>7 )
0029   error( 'currently only works if 3<=nclasses<=7'); end;
0030 if( nargin<5 || isempty(use01targets)); use01targets=0; end;
0031 
0032 % create code (limited for now)
0033 [C,nbits] = clfEcocCode( nclasses );
0034 clf = ecoc(nclasses, nbits, C, use01targets  ); % didn't use to pass use01?
0035 clf.verbosity = 0; % don't diplay output
0036 
0037 % initialize and temporarily store binary learner
0038 clf.templearner = feval( clfInit, p, clfparams{:} );
0039 
0040 % ecoctrain2 is custom version of ecoctrain
0041 clf.funTrain = @clfEcocTrain;
0042 clf.funFwd = @ecocfwd;
0043 
0044 function clf = clfEcocTrain( clf, varargin )
0045 
0046 clf = ecoctrain( clf, clf.templearner, varargin{:} );
